Dear Nullity Community,Here is our latest update!

Nullity is pleased to announce that the official website data has been updated. Users can now go to the official website to view their winning details. All user winning data is authentic and verifiable on the blockchain!

Nullity team has been working around the clock for 36 hours. We're taking a break now to recharge.

We've cleaned up abnormal TXs, which is good news for most minters.

We've finished matching incentive testnet user data.

Next up:

- Verify and compare normal data
